briefdescription.para: List of functions to call for calculating spherical harmonic corrections.

detaileddescription.para: List of functions to call for calculating spherical harmonic corrections. Each function modifies MatrixXd arguments (cosine, sine) as they are passed by reference, and adds the required (tidal) correction.

briefdescription.para: Function returning state of body being deformed.

detaileddescription.para: Function returning state of body being deformed.

briefdescription.para: Function providing rotation from inertial to body being deformed-fixed frame.

detaileddescription.para: Function providing rotation from inertial to body being deformed-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: List of state functions of body causing deformations.

detaileddescription.para: List of state functions of body causing deformations.
Reference radius (typically equatorial) of body being deformed's spherical harmonic gravity field.
Reference radius (typically equatorial) of body being deformed's spherical harmonic gravity field.

briefdescription.para: Function returning mass of body being deformed.

detaileddescription.para: Function returning mass of body being deformed.

briefdescription.para: List of functions returning masses of bodies causing deformation.

detaileddescription.para: List of functions returning masses of bodies causing deformation.

briefdescription.para: List of love numbers for each degree and order.

detaileddescription.para: List of love numbers for each degree and order. First vector level denotes degree (index 0 = degree 2), second vector level must be of size (loveNumbers.size( ) + 2, i.e. maximum degree == maximum order.

briefdescription.para: List of names of bodies causing deformation.

detaileddescription.para: List of names of bodies causing deformation.

briefdescription.para: Ratio of masses in current calculation step.

detaileddescription.para: Ratio of masses of body causing deformation to body being deformed in current calculation step.

briefdescription.para: Ratio of radii in current calculation step.

detaileddescription.para: Ratio of equatorial radius of body being deformed over distance between center of body being deformed to center of body causing deformation in current calculation step

briefdescription.para: Ratio of radii in current calculation step to the power (degree+1).

detaileddescription.para: Ratio of equatorial radius of body being deformed over distance between center of body being deformed to center of body causing deformation, to the power (degree+1), in current calculation step

briefdescription.para: Sine of latitude of currently considered body in current calculation step.

detaileddescription.para: Sine of latitude of body causing deformation in frame fixed to body being deformed in current calculation step.

briefdescription.para: Longitude of currently considered body times i in current calculation step.

detaileddescription.para: i (sqrt(-1)) times longitude of body causing deformation in frame fixed to body being deformed in current calculation step.

briefdescription.para: Current argument of the tide.

detaileddescription.para: Current argument of the tide, to be used as input to calculateSolidBodyTideSingleCoefficientSetCorrectionFromAmplitude, modulates the tide as exp( -tideArgument).

briefdescription.para: Current amplitude of the tide.

detaileddescription.para: Current amplitude of the tide, to be used as input to calculateSolidBodyTideSingleCoefficientSetCorrectionFromAmplitude.

briefdescription.para: Current position of body being deformed.
Current rotation to frame fixed to deformed body.
Tidal corrections to cosine coefficients at current calculation step.
Tidal corrections to sine coefficients at current calculation step.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d(const double) > deformedBodyStateFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Quaterniond(const double) > deformedBodyOrientationFunction, const std::vector< std::function< Eigen::Vector6d(const double) > > deformingBodyStateFunctions, const double deformedBodyReferenceRadius, const std::function< double() > deformedBodyMass, const std::vector< std::function< double() > > deformingBodyMasses, const std::map< int, std::vector< std::complex< double > > > loveNumbers, const std::vector< std::string > deformingBodies)
memberdef.name: BasicSolidBodyTideGravityFieldVariations

param.type: const std::map< int, std::vector< std::complex< double > > >

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Contructor, sets Love numbers and properties of deformed and tide-raising bodies.
deformedBodyStateFunction
Function returning state of body being deformed.
deformedBodyOrientationFunction
Function providing rotation from inertial to body being deformed-fixed frame
deformingBodyStateFunctions
List of state functions of body causing deformations.
deformedBodyReferenceRadius
Reference radius (typically equatorial) of body being deformed's spherical harmonic gravity field.
deformedBodyMass
Function returning mass (or gravitational parameter) of body being deformed.
deformingBodyMasses
List of functions returning masses (or gravitational parameters) of bodies causing deformation.
loveNumbers
List of love numbers for each degree and order. First vector level denotes degree (index 0 = degree 2), second vector level denotes order and must be of maximum size (loveNumbers.size( ) + 2, i.e. maximum degree >= maximum order)
deformingBodies
List of names of bodies causing deformation

briefdescription.para: Function for calculating basic spherical harmonic coefficient corrections.

detaileddescription.para: Function for calculating spherical harmonic coefficient corrections.

Function for calculating basic spherical harmonic coefficient corrections.
time
Time at which variations are to be calculated.
Pair of matrices containing variations in (cosine,sine) coefficients.

briefdescription.para: Derived function for calculating spherical harmonic coefficient corrections.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived function for calculating spherical harmonic coefficient corrections.
time
Time at which variations are to be calculated.
Pair of matrices containing variations in (cosine,sine) coefficients.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the love numbers at given degree.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the love numbers at given degree. Returns a vector containing (complex) love numbers at all orders in current degree.
degree
Degree from which love numbers are to be retrieved.
Vector of love numbers (i^{th} entry representing i^{th} order in requested degree) containing love numbers at current degree.

memberdef.type: const std::map< int, std::vector< std::complex< double > > >

briefdescription.para: Function to return all love numbers.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return all love numbers, i.e. at all degrees and orders.

briefdescription.para: Function to reset the love numbers at given degree.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to reset the love numbers at given degree. Input requires a vector containing (complex) love numbers at all orders in current degree.
degree
Degree from which love numbers are to be retrieved.
loveNumbers
Vector of love numbers (i^{th} entry representing i^{th} order in requested degree) containing new love numbers at current degree.

briefdescription.para: Function to return the current corrections to the cosine coefficients.

Function to return the current corrections to the cosine coefficients (as calculated by current instance of this class).
Current corrections to the cosine coefficients.

briefdescription.para: Function to return the current corrections to the sine coefficients.

Function to return the current corrections to the sine coefficients (as calculated by current instance of this class).

briefdescription.para: Calculates basic solid body gravity field corrections due to single body.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculates basic solid body gravity field corrections for all degrees and orders set. The arguments are modified as they are passed by reference, through which the corrections are returned. Class variables denoting properties of currently considered body must have been set before this function is called.
cTermCorrections
Corrections to cosine terms (passed by reference; correction added to input value).
sTermCorrections
Corrections to sine terms.
(passed by reference; correction added to input value).

briefdescription.para: Sets current properties (mass state) of body causing tidal deformation.

detaileddescription.para: Sets current properties (mass state) of body involved in tidal deformation.

Sets current properties (mass state) of body causing tidal deformation.
bodyIndex
Index of body causing deformation for which data is to be retrieved. Deformed body is also updated to bodyIndex = 0.
evaluationTime
Time at which properties are to be evaluated.

briefdescription.para: Calculate tidal amplitude and argument at current degree and order.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculate tidal amplitude and argument at current degree and order.
degree
Degree of tide.
order
Order of tide.
Class to calculate first-order solid body tide gravity field variations on a single body raised by any number of bodies up to any degree and order.
